unnormalised: Hey guys, any news on Jadeja's knee? I heard it was bad. Hope he recovers soon, maybe get that NCA training going! Remember what happened to Yuvraj Singh? Wishing him a speedy recovery like SRK's character in Kal Ho Naa Ho after his ailment. Let’s see if he's back for the next Ranji Trophy season. Prayers from Delhi! Get well soon!
